items.title: Microsoft says clients of its Azure cloud platform may experience increased latency after multiple international cables in the Red Sea were cut (Susanne Barton/Bloomberg)
items.summary:
Susanne Barton / Bloomberg:
Microsoft says clients of its Azure cloud platform may experience increased latency after multiple international cables in the Red Sea were cut  —  Microsoft Corp. said on Saturday that clients of its Azure cloud platform may experience increased latency after multiple international cables in the Red Sea were cut.

items.title: Zelenskiy says nearly 60% of Ukrainian arms home-produced
items.summary: (Reuters) -President Volodymyr Zelenskiy said on Saturday that nearly 60% of weapons used by Ukraine's military were domestically produced, already exceeding a target he set two months ago. Read full story

items.title: Broken cable caused fatal Lisbon funicular derailment: investigation
items.summary: LISBON, Sept. 6 (Xinhua) -- Portugal's transport accident authority confirmed Saturday that a snapped steel cable caused the Gloria Funicular derailment in downtown Lisbon, killing 16 and injuring 22. Read full story

items.title: Cable snapped before Lisbon funicular crash, investigators say

items.title: Poland buries wartime remains in western Ukraine as part of reconciliation
items.summary: PUZHNYKY, Ukraine (Reuters) -Remains of Poles killed by Ukrainian nationalist insurgents during World War Two were buried in western Ukraine on Saturday as officials from both countries looked on, a move to ease a rare strain in relations between the two close allies. Read full story

items.title: Anker offering 30% off early bird deals on new Prime power banks and 25W MagSafe gear + FREE backpack
items.summary:
Yesterday as part of its IFA reveals, Anker debuted its new Prime power family. Ranging from the new 26,250mAh 300W Power Bank through to the new 160W 3-Port Anker Prime Charger, and the impressive-looking new 3-in-1 25W Prime Wireless Charging Station with AirCool tech and the built-in display, just about all of it is set to release on September 29, 2025, and there are some notable promotions inbound. Anker site is promising 30% off as part of the early bird perks alongside a FREE laptop bag worth $70 on select purchases. Scope out the details below. 

more…

items.title: Samsung launches new Galaxy Tab S11 with FREE $150 storage upgrade, up to $800 off with trade, more
items.summary:
At today’s Galaxy Event, Samsung unleashed the new Galaxy Tab S11 series alongside the new, more affordable Galaxy S25 FE. All of the details on both of the new devices are, of course, waiting for you over at 9to5Google, but we are also tracking some notable early deals on both, including FREE double storage upgrades, up to $800 in trade-in credit, and some serious bundle opportunities too. All of this will also stack with your $50 reserve credit if you happened to take advantage there.

items.title: This large tool organizer with companion power strip is discounted to $56 at Amazon right now
items.summary:
POKIPO Large Tool Organizer with Power Station

Buy for $56 (Reg. $66)

What we love

Finally get your workshop or garage in order with this affordable and spacious tool rack that’s currently discounted at Amazon. It wields a total of four tiers and can support “up to 600 pounds” of weight. Another perk I love here is that there is a 4-outlet power strip so you can easily top off batteries and more.

items.summary:
Adorve Rugged Metal and Silicone Apple Watch Band

Buy for $13 (Reg. $16)

Clip the on-page $3 off coupon.

What we love

This is one of those bands that will look great with an Apple Watch Ultra. It features a rugged look that not only leans into a thick silicone, but also large metal lugs that mirror the color of the Natural Titanium Apple Watch Ultra.

items.title: Don’t struggle with baked goods at home, Cuisinart’s Convection Bread Maker just hit the $127 low (Reg. $200+)
items.summary:
Amazon is offering the best price yet on the Cuisinart Convection Bread Maker Machine at $126.95 shipped, after clipping the on-page coupon. Normally, you’d be spending $200 or more on this model without any discounts, which has received few discounts over 2025, with the best of them dropping costs to $159. It’s all getting beaten out by today’s deal, which cuts $73 off the going rate for a new all-time low.

more…

items.title: Live again: Grab a 24GB M4 Mac mini at $300 less than the one you can buy at Amazon
items.summary:
In the lead up to Labor Day weekend, B&H has been going crazy with the Mac deals. Delivering some of the best prices we have tracked all year on configurations you just can’t get at Amazon and Best Buy. One of the more interesting and standout offers here is on the 24GB M4 Mac mini at $699 shipped – this is not the $999 24GB model you can get at Amazon, but rather the most affordable 24GB configuration you can buy with a solid $100 price drop. 

more…

Buy for $12 (Reg. $17)

I’ve always loved the look of these cases from Spigen. I think they can help an iPhone look a bit more like the Nothing smartphone lineup, which is wildly different look that always catches my eye. Alongside the fun design, you’ll also garner MagSafe compatibilty and “military-grade drop protection.”

items.title: Ninja’s Flip 8-in-1 toaster oven and air fryer takes up less space while still covering 4-person meals at $150 annual low (Reg. $220)
items.summary:
Amazon is offering the Ninja Flip 8-in-1 Toaster Oven and Air Fryer back at $149.99 shipped, which matches the price we’re also seeing directly from the brand’s website. Normally going for $220 at full price, we saw discounts regularly take the price down to this same rate up until late May when things shifted and we only saw drops to $180. Now after three months the price is finally coming back down, and while we have seen it go lower in the past, you’re still looking at a solid $70 price cut to the best rate we’ve tracked in 2025.

more…

items.title: Exclusive: 9to5 readers can score the best price yet on Nomad’s new leather Pixel Watch band with our code
items.summary:
Nomad is one of our favorite tech accessory brands, and has been for quite some time. It is best known for its Apple gear add-ons, but it also recently released a new leather strap for Pixel Watch 4, as you might have seen featured over on 9to5Google. And with our ongoing exclusive sitewide sale live through tonight for readers, you can now use code 9to520 to score the first deal on one. 

more…

PINSPARK Long Sleeve Polo Shirts (3-pack)

Buy for $24.50 (Reg. $37)

Apply code YYOIMMBD during checkout

What we love

I’m already wearing long sleeves on a daily basis where I live. The weather has really cooled off and so I’m putting off extra layers as much as I can by wearing shirts like this whenever possible. Today’s offer delivers three long-sleeve polos for only $8 each.

Through its official Amazon storefront, REDTIGER is giving folks another shot at the best pricing on its F7NP Front and Rear Dash Cam at $85.49 shipped. Usually going for $130 at full price, discounts began seeing regular drops to $90 since May, with the costs going lower to this rate for the first time during July’s Prime Day event. Now the low price is back again, saving you $45 off the tag for a return all-time low.

items.title: Natron’s liquidation shows why the US isn’t ready to make its own batteries
items.summary: The sodium-ion battery startup went from announcing a $1.4 billion factory to filing for liquidation in just over a year. Natron's troubled journey illustrates the challenges in making batteries in the U.S.
